dialogue.content: My knee flares up when I do stairs.
How long has it been going on, and does it ever swell or lock?
A few months. No swelling or locking, just soreness.
Got it. Anything besides stairs that clearly makes it worse?
Deep bending and crouching. I feel it the next day.
Do you have access to a gym, or are you mostly at home?
Mostly at home, and I only have about 10 minutes a day for this.
Perfect-short routines can work well if they're consistent.
If it helped me handle stairs without flare-ups, I'd actually keep doing it.
